long_description: The outdoor-inspired Lowepro Dashpoint 20 camera case is a colorful and protective pouch for your compact camera or electronic device. Wide-mouth opening with reverse zippers offers easy access to gear. Built-in memory card pocket supplies a convenient place to stash spare memory-right inside top lid. Durable EVA padding provides protective, impact-resistant construction. Versatile attachment with vertical webbing, horizontal flaps and rip-and-stick fasteners secures the pouch to most attachment points such as loops, straps and daisy chains. The Lowepro Dashpoint 20 camera case comes with a removable, adjustable shoulder strap that features rotating snaphooks for a comfortable carrying option.
short_description: The outdoor-inspired Lowepro Dashpoint 20 camera case is a colorful and protective pouch for your compact camera or electronic device.
